thread.title: PA Preps/Big 33 Senior Spotlight: Miles Sanders
thread.title_full: PA Preps/Big 33 Senior Spotlight: Miles Sanders

title: PA Preps/Big 33 Senior Spotlight: Miles Sanders
text:
PA Preps/Big 33 Senior Spotlight: Miles Sanders Ed O'Brien PaPreps.com Recruiting Analyst PA PREPS and The Big 33 have partnered up to give even more exposure to football players here in the state of Pennsylvania. PA PREPS/ Big 33 will start the "PA PREPS/Big 33 Senior Prospect Watch" for the senior class (2016) up until signing day. Note: this has NO BEARING WHATSOEVER ON WHO GETS PICKED FOR THE BIG 33 GAME. District 7 MILES SANDERS Woodland Hills - 6'0", 200 lbs. PA PREPS/BIG 33 Senior Prospect to Watch: Despite missing a couple of games, Miles Sanders has ran the ball 50 times for 698 yards and nine rushing touchdowns. Sanders will be playing in the 2016 Under Armour All-American Game this upcoming January. Sanders committed to Penn State before the season and has helped lead Woodland Hills to a 7-0 record. Woodland Hills is currently ranked #2 in our PA PREPS Class AAAA state rankings. Sanders is rated at a four-star running back. Below are his mid-season football highlights. 
Ed O'Brien
